name: SEA-STORMS Web System
description: A combination of a common data system for sharing measurements and forecasts, a multi-model sea forecasting system, a geoportal and interactive geo-visualization tools to make results available to the general public. Developed within the framework of the projects I-STORMS and STREAM, supported by the Interreg ADRION and ITALY-CROATIA programmes, funded under the European Regional Development Fund and IPA II fund.
